item.title: Auto repair chain Monro soars after Carl Icahn takes 15% stake to become largest shareholder
item.description: Icahn disclosed ownership of 4.4 million shares, or almost a 15% stake in Monro, according to a new regulatory filing.

item.title: Xpeng to let other carmakers use its partly-autonomous driving system
item.description: Chinese electric car company Xpeng said German automaker Volkswagen would be the first client for its new driver-assist system.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: AMD, Cava, Pinterest, Super Micro Computer and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Chinese EV maker Xpeng to launch robotaxis, humanoid robots with self-developed AI chips
item.description: Chinese electric car company Xpeng is following in Tesla's footsteps by moving into robotaxis and humanoid robots.

item.title: Bitcoin retail investor at 'max desperation,' says Bitwise CIO, but crypto winter not coming
item.description: Bitcoin's fall below $100,000 sparks fears that a new crypto winter has begun, but Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan sees reasons why this selloff may not last ...
